alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 11:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Rain showers with strong northwest wind gusts will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, southern Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Duck Creek Rec Area, or 15 miles south of Glasgow, moving southeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Nashua, Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Tampico, Duck Creek Rec Area, Fort Peck Marina, Hell Creek Rec Area, Frazer, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Park Grove, The Bentonite Plant, Haxby, Weldon and Whatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Fort Peck Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Strong winds will create high waves that could tip or swamp boats.
